page.title: 14TRADE
page.content: The majority of {Trade} in Biggar is orientated towards the {Tourist {Industry},however it must be added that Biggar meats makes an important contribution to the {Economy }of the area on an all the year round basis.The {Tourist }trade has attracted business into the town like Scotland Direct formerly based at New Lanark.Scotland Direct with its involvment in thimbles and Gourmet foods can be reckoned to be a major employer.The preliferation of Hotels and cafes in the town also reflect the importance of Tourism.There are a number of shops like groceries ,which reflect the fact that Biggar is essentially an important centre for the local farming community.Generally speaking Biggar is a well off community and this can be seenin the lack ofunlet shop premises.
